Dune::AlbertaMarkerVector

Dune::AlbertaMarkerVector Class Reference

#include <agrid.hh>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class to mark the Vertices on the leaf level to visit every vertex only once for the LevelIterator codim == dim
